Bellevue.Ward House (Seattle): The Ward House is a house on Capitol Hill in Seattle, Washington. Having been built in 1882, it is one of the oldest houses in Seattle. Existing houses reportedly built before 1882 in Seattle include the following: 2629 East Aloha Street (1881), 727 28th Avenue (1870), and Maynard's House located at 3045 64th Avenue Southwest (Approximately 1860 ± 2 years).
